column1:
(['pyproject-hooks'], ['This is a low-level library for calling build-backends in ', '-based project. It provides the basic functionality to help write tooling that generates distribution files from Python projects.', 'Logic for calling build-backend hooks in a subprocess.', 'Automated fallbacks for optional build-backend hooks.', 'Control over how the subprocesses are run.', 'Environment management / isolation', 'It is the responsibility of the caller to setup an environment containing the build dependencies, and provide a ', ' to this library to use that environment. It is also the caller’s responsibility to install any “additional” dependencies before calls to certain hooks.', 'A command line interface', 'This is a low-level library that would simplify writing such an interface but providing a command line interface is out-of-scope for this project.', 'These roles are covered by tools like ', ', which use this library.', '
', '
', '
', '
', '
', '
'])
